item.description:
Organizer: Will
Contact: http://photo.meetup.c...
Target Audience: All Members

I will be trying to get to both Friday Launches the Sat Launch and both Sunday ones with Weather permitting...looking at the site, looks to have some interesting balloons and some fun activities
doesn't seem to have a general admission but has parking for a minimal donation by some organizations
Link:
Lewiston Maine Hot Air Balloon Festival
item.name: Lewiston Maine Hot Air Balloon Festival
